name: Capsule Jump
description: Capsule Jump is a difficult Jump and Run platformer Game. As a caspule you need to pass the level, that are very difficult. There are 55 level by now, which have different environments. Will you get through that game?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Dual Core Prozessor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB video memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 718 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad Core Prozessor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB video memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 800 MB available space
